short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid of social media noise by replacing your news feed with a verse from the Quran.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quran in news feed extension Helps you focus on your work or study by removing the distractions of the Facebook news feed and replacing it with a verse from the Quran.

You can search for what you want directly on Facebook - a study group for example - without losing your focus and falling into a cycle of wasting time.
